title: Overcoming Perfectionism As You Pursue Your Dreams
description:
Have you ever found yourself procrastinating or putting off the steps you need to take to hit publish, press go, or step into a new opportunity because you’re afraid to fail or mess it up? This, friend, is a sneaky but powerful thing called perfectionism at work! In this episode, Jordan brings on Mallory Ervin — a YouTube personality, former Miss Kentucky, Miss America 4th runner up, and 3 time Amazing Race contestant — to help you tackle perfectionism once and for all! Tune in if you’re ready to stop holding back and start taking action on those dreams inside your heart!

Sign up for the Own Your Everyday Book Club here!

Check out Mallory's IG here!

Get your copy of Own Your Everyday

Say hi on social!

Instagram

Facebook
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
